content: Accord Royale is a stunning composition of floral, fruity, and musky notes, blended to perfection to create a fragrance that captivates the senses. The top notes of sparkling bergamot and juicy pear open up to reveal a heart of delicate peony, velvety rose, and soft lily of the valley, while the base notes of warm vanilla, creamy sandalwood, and sensual musk create a lingering trail that leaves a lasting impression. This fragrance is a true olfactory masterpiece that embodies the essence of elegance and sophistication, making it the perfect choice for any special occasion.
